id: Khloe Kardashian shares emotional message as she relives finding out about Tristan cheating
paragraph: 135.6m sharesKeeping Up With The Kardashians has finally caught up with the time Khloe found out her beau Tristan Thompson ‘cheated’ on her.And while fans were eager to watch how the family reacted to the scandal, Koko was less convinced by the episode.Taking to Twitter, the 34-year-old opened up on her feelings behind the episode with an emotional message to her fans.Addressing her 26.2million followers, she wrote: ‘Tonight’s episode is an uncomfortable and super emotional one for me, but when we signed up for this show over a decade ago, we signed up for a reality show, which meant showing you guys inside our lives, the good, the bad and the ugly.‘To relive these moments all over again is incredibly difficult emotionally but I also hope that with every trail, tribulation and curve ball life throws at us, that we ALL get to learn from our journeys.’Tonight’s episode is an uncomfortable and super emotional one for me, but when we signed up for this show over a decade ago, we signed up for a reality show, which meant showing you guys inside our lives, the good, the bad and the ugly.— Khloé (@khloekardashian) November 4, 2018To relive these moments all over again is incredibly difficult emotionally but I also hope that with every trail, tribulation and curve ball life throws at us, that we ALL get to learn from our journeys.— Khloé (@khloekardashian) November 4, 2018Amidst the tough times, I have been blessed with the ultimate gift, my sweet baby True who has changed my life in ways I never could have imagined.— Khloé (@khloekardashian) November 4, 2018She added: ‘Amidst the tough times, I have been blessed with the ultimate gift, my sweet baby True who has changed my life in ways I never could have imagined.’The star then shared a clip of tonight’s episode where her big sis Kim can be heard saying: ‘She’s literally going to go into labour over this.’Khloe wrote in the caption: ‘Remember that you are never alone in your pain, and that everything is temporary.‘Pain, joy, elation, panic, anxiety, it is all temporary. Be grateful for the experiences that continue to build character, and make you who you are.: ‘Fans were quick to comment on her string of tweets and offered their support to the reality star.One wrote: ‘Khloe one of the reasons why I love u so much it’s bc you can be at the lowest point of your life and you will know that if you share what you’re going through u can help someone else who’s be going through the exactly same thing as u. Thanks for that. (sic)’Another added: ‘You’re one of the strongest women I see on television…praying for you and family always. God has his hands on you. Love (sic)’Someone else commented: ‘We love you and thank you for letting us being in this part of the journey with you!’Following on from her fans’ positive response, Khloe then revealed that she might not join in on the KUWTK’s chat.Kim Kardashian says Tristan Thompson is only sorry for 'cheating scandal to save job'Khloe Kardashian will spend Thanksgiving with Tristan Thompson amid split rumoursThe Kardashians turn out in force for People's Choice Awards as they urge fans to join relWhen one follower addressed the chat and asked if she would be appearing, Khlo said: ‘I will see how much I can handle. This goes for tonight AND next week.’Earlier this year Khloe’s relationship with Tristan made headlines after video footage emerged of the athlete kissing a number of other girls.One clip showed him getting close to Instagram model Lani Blair at the PH-D Lounge in New York City, while another security tape revealed him flirting with three women in October 2017.If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.MORE: Kim and Kourtney Kardashian have definitely put their feud to bed as they slay at LACMA GalaMORE: Kim Kardashian ‘stops for snacks mid-sex and spent $70,000 a year on thongs’
